data.title: Sidral Mundet Apple Soda, 11.16 oz., 30 pk.
data.meta_description: Buy Sidral Mundet Apple Soda, 11.16 oz., 30 pk. : Soda at SamsClub.com
data.text:
Enjoy a bubbly and refreshing beverage with Sidral Mundet Apple Soda. It’s an authentic soft drink from Mexico that has a distinct apple flavor to it. Mundet apple soda is available in two flavors. You can choose between regular apple flavor or green apple for a sour twist. This Mexican apple soda has been a mainstay of the Mexican-American community since the early 1900s. Today, it can be found at many food trucks and soda shops. This 30-pack of Sidral Mundet soda contains individual 11.16 oz bottles.

What is Sidral Mundet Apple Soda?

This Mexican apple soda comes in a distinctly-shaped bottle and forms a popular part of the beverage culture in Mexico. It’s made from natural flavors and natural sugar and doesn’t contain high-fructose corn syrup or caffeine, making it a healthy choice over most other soda beverages. Sidral Mexican soda has a distinct apple flavor and crispness. It’s made from real apple juice and is a favorite beverage in many families because of its natural properties. Some even claim that the pasteurization process used in making this Mundet apple soda lends it medical benefits.

What’s the Best Way to Enjoy Sidral Mundet Apple Soda?

Sidral Mundet soda contains prominent notes of apple cider with an authentic taste of apple. This bubbly beverage is a popular product sold in taco carts where it pairs well with the salty carnitas tacos being served hot off the grill. Sidral apple soda also makes for a good accompaniment with sherry. You can enjoy it as a refreshing drink to cool you down on a hot summer day without having to worry about health implications. A bottle of Mundet apple soda can also be enjoyed at work for an afternoon pick-me-up or you can keep one in your bag for refreshing yourself after a workout. The small bottles are easy to carry around during vacations and long trips.

About Mundet

Mundet apple soda was founded in 1902 and quickly became a famous name. In addition to its uniquely-flavored beverages, it was one of the early companies who adopted the crown cap on soda bottles. This soda forms an important part of the Mexican beverage culture and is a favorite among customers across the USA.
